title: were the robbers caught who robbed the man on Tues18 Oct, and what is gonna become of him for shooting and killing two innoncent men?
text:
I'm not sure that I understand your question, BJ. Are you saying
that the man who was robbed shot and killed two men? If so, what's
his name and when did this happen?



Also, are you referring to the robbery that occurred Oct. 16 on
Monitor Drive? If not, when and where was the robbery?
